channel.title: Going a different path, three things
channel.description:
After my other post, about loading all 474 models, I've given up on it, going to just add certain items to keep the cache smaller. Just have three questions, 1. I'm guessing I don't have the 474 model header, when I wear certain 474 items, they show, then others make me invisible (such as armadyl helm, godswords, helm of neitiznot etc): [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/2n689q1.png[/img] [b]Edit: I dumped the models from a 474 client, if I use my Dragonfire shield's model, it makes my characters invisible, if I use someone elses, it doesn't? I used the RS Datmaker too..[/b]
2. How do I load a client background (317 client), from the cache in Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1?
3. I'm using a different based client other than Bluurr/Delta, on a DeltaScape based server, and when I use my headicons, my client freezes, tried a lot, any tips on where to start?

item.title: Going a different path, three things
item.dc:creator: @Vince2 Vince,
item.description:
@Vince2 wrote:

After my other post, about loading all 474 models, I’ve given up on it, going to just add certain items to keep the cache smaller. Just have three questions,

  1. I’m guessing I don’t have the 474 model header, when I wear certain 474 items, they show, then others make me invisible (such as armadyl helm, godswords, helm of neitiznot etc):

    2n689q1.png982×318

    Edit:
    I dumped the models from a 474 client, if I use my Dragonfire shield’s model, it makes my characters invisible, if I use someone elses, it doesn’t? I used the RS Datmaker too…

  2. How do I load a client background (317 client), from the cache in Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1?

  3. I’m using a different based client other than Bluurr/Delta, on a DeltaScape based server, and when I use my headicons, my client freezes, tried a lot, any tips on where to start?

Read full topic
item.source: Going a different path, three things
